pesticide.PPE: Applicators and other handlers must wear long-sleeved shirt and long pants, and shoes plus socks.
pesticide.signal_word: KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN

Safety_Information.general_Info: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eyes open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow. Do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by a poison control center or doctor. Do not give anything by mouth to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing. Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes.
Safety_Information.if_Inhaled: Move person to fresh air. If person is not breathing, call 911 or an ambulance, then give artificial respiration, preferably mouth-to-mouth if possible.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Have the product container or label with you when calling a poison control center or doctor or going for treatment.
